Class TetrisGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisGame

  • public class TetrisGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the TetrisBoard. Attempts to move and rotate pieces. Ends a round when a piece reaches the lowest point it can go, and counts the lines and tetrises produced.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TetrisGame()
      Constructor.

      void attemptMove(int moveType)
      Tries to implement the move that the user wants to make, then checks for the end of a round.

      Returns the number of tetrises completed.
      TetrisBoard getTetrisBoard()
      Returns the TetrisBoard.

      Checks board for a piece of a TetrisPiece in the specified cell.

        public TetrisGame()
        Constructor. Creates a new TetrisBoard. Initializes numLines and numTetrises.

        Tries to implement the move that the user wants to make, then checks for the end of a round.

      • testBlock

        public boolean testBlock(int rowNum,
                         int colNum)
        Checks board for a piece of a TetrisPiece in the specified cell.
        Parameters:
        rowNum - the row of the cell
        colNum - the column of the cell
        Returns:
        tetrisBlock true if there is a piece, false otherwise
